action.action-desc: Mr. Grayson introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide that foreign income be considered in the determination of eligibility for grants and loans under that Act.

section.header: Inclusion of foreign income for purposes of determining total income for higher education grant and loan eligibility
section.text: Section 480(b) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1087vv(b)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by redesignating subparagraphs (H) and (I) as subparagraphs (I) and (J), respectively; and
by inserting after subparagraph (G) the following new subparagraph:
foreign income excluded for purposes of Federal income taxes;
in subparagraph (D), by striking the semicolon and inserting ; or;
